text: How do you celebrate 13 1/2 years of sobriety? By booking your motherf*%king vaccine appointment, that's how! ☕️🧡 Feel like bursting into tears from the relief, but I'm a bit numb from the shock of it finally coming to fruition. ❤️💉 #COVID19 #vaccine #Toronto #recovery https://t.co/DpSzX3qWPU
